title: Bloomberg Markets: iCIMS' Wright on Outlook for Fed Rate Hike
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: iCIMS' Wright on Outlook for Fed Rate Hike
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Josh Wright Chief Economist iCIMS Discussing Federal Reserve Chair Janet Yellen's Congrssional testimony and outlook for Fed tightening.
